location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant James Tronson, Commander of the HC Brig Euphrates, to Lieutenant-Colonel Samuel Hennell, Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: James Tronson relays information received from the Agent at Sharjah, Moolah Hussein [Mullah Husain], regarding the pirate, Saheil ben Ateish, and his boat. Apparently Saheil ben Ateish ran the boat into the cove known as Alladeid; he then left the boat there and went inland. Tronson states that the boat has not been seen since it entered the cove. Tronson encloses a letter (not included) from the brother of the Shaik [Sheikh Said bin Tahnun Al Nahayan] of Abothabbee [Abu Dhabi].
